contents: Article 6 (Election of Representatives) ① In accordance with Article 14, Paragraph 1, Item 4 and Article 42, Paragraph 5 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Committee elects by voting two athlete representatives who will be delegates with voting rights at the General Assembly of Representatives of the Sports Council, and shall act as athlete representatives. Elected members concurrently serve as representatives of the Sports Council and members of the Athletes Committee. Revised April 28, 2016, April 3, 2017. ② Pursuant to Article 42, Paragraph 5 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Committee elects one player representative from among the elected members to become a director with voting rights at the Board of Directors of the Sports Association, and the player representative elected Members concurrently serve as directors of the Athletic Association and members of the Athletes Committee. Revised April 28, 2016, April 3, 2017. ③ Athletes representing Paragraphs 1 and 2 must have participated in at least one of the three most recent Olympic Games. Revised 2016. 4. 28.
